panels.description: Total TVL of yearn vaults not subtracting delegated deposits
panels.title: TVL ($)

panels.description: $ of Funds unallocated

targets.expr: sum(sum by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", vault!~"yvUSDC 0.2.2|yvDAI 0.2.2|yvWBTC 0.3.1|yvHEGIC 0.3.0"}) * ((sum by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="totalAssets", experimental="false", vault!~"yvUSDC 0.2.2|yvDAI 0.2.2|yvWBTC 0.3.1|yvHEGIC 0.3.0"})-(sum by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="totalDebt", experimental="false", vault!~"yvUSDC 0.2.2|yvDAI 0.2.2|yvWBTC 0.3.1|yvHEGIC 0.3.0"}))) / (sum by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="totalAssets", experimental="false", vault!~"yvUSDC 0.2.2|yvDAI 0.2.2|yvWBTC 0.3.1|yvHEGIC 0.3.0"}) )))

panels.description: Avg summed apy for all production vaults. This is with weekly compunding taking the share price difference over a week.
panels.title: Avg APY

targets.expr: (avg by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="totalDebt", experimental="false", vault!~"yvUSDC 0.2.2|yvDAI 0.2.2|yvWBTC 0.3.1|yvHEGIC 0.3.0", network="ETH"}) / avg by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="totalAssets", experimental="false", vault!~"yvUSDC 0.2.2|yvDAI 0.2.2|yvWBTC 0.3.1|yvHEGIC 0.3.0", network="ETH"}) )

(avg by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="totalDebt", experimental="false", vault!~"yvAVAX 0.4.3", network="FTM"}) / avg by (vault) (yearn_vault{param="totalAssets", experimental="false", vault!~"yvAVAX 0.4.3", network="FTM"}) )
